compatibility.notes: The GPL-3.0-or-later license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under GPL-3.0-or-later. This applies to both static and dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Ensure that all recipients have the same freedoms you received.
Mark modified versions as changed to avoid misattribution.
Do not impose further restrictions on the rights granted by the GPL.
license.name: GPL-3.0-or-later
obligations: Distribute the source code or make it available to recipients.
Include a copy of the GPL license with distributed software.
Include copyright notices of the original authors.
State any changes made to the original software.
Distribute modified versions under the same GPL license.
